name: Blood+ Souyoku no Battle Rondo
synopsis: Licensed for the PlayStation 2 and PlayStation Portable systems by Sony Computer Entertainment, Blood+ is the follow-up to the vampire anime Blood the Last Vampire, telling the story of what happens between parts 1 and 2 of the anime. The game is split into two parts. In the Active Demo part, you work through the storyline, selecting your path through dialogue sequences. The game's action part is a full-fledged action-oriented battle system where you face off against enemies with your trusty sword. Enemies that have been defeated release crystals which are used to build up a special attack.
